effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to [catch]{mechanic:catch} a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon is []{type:water}- or []{type:bug}-type, this ball has a catch rate of 3×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
みずタイプと　むしタイプの
ポケモンが　捕まえやすくなる
ちょっと　変わった　ボール。

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
is more effective when attempting
to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.

Poké Ball un po’ diversa. Risulta particolarmente
efficace sui Pokémon di tipo Acqua e Coleottero.

Es algo distinta a las demás. Funciona
especialmente bien con los Pokémon de tipo
Agua y Bicho.

Ein Ball, der sich besonders gut eignet,
um Wasser- und Käfer-Pokémon zu fangen.

Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui fonctionne
particulièrement bien sur les Pokémon Eau ou
Insecte.

물타입과 벌레타입의
포켓몬을 잡기 쉬운
조금 특이한 볼.

みずタイプと　むしタイプの
ポケモンが　つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien
sur les Pokémon Eau ou Insecte.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on Water- and
Bug-type Pokémon.

A somewhat different BALL that
works especially well on WATER- and
BUG-type POKéMON.

A BALL that works
well on WATER- and
BUG-type POKéMON.

A BALL that works
well on WATER- and
BUG-type POKéMON.
